Pre-Game Insights: Vietnam could not maintain their first-half advantage and lost 4-2 to Japan in their opening fixture.
Vietnam conceded a second-half strike in three successive competitive fixtures.
Indonesia suffered their first defeat in their Asian Cup history in their opening fixture.
Indonesia has lost their second match at this tournament in each of their previous four group stage campaigns.
Vietnam have not scored in the second half in their last four matches against Indonesia.
Vietnam's last victory over Indonesia came in December 2016 (2-1).
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vietnam entered the match on a three-match losing run in all competitions.
Indonesia conceded the winning goal deep into first-half stoppage time in their opening match.
Indonesia's captain Asnawi Mangkualam suffered a muscle injury before their opening match but played in their second game.
